summary: This is an email from an Assistant U.S. Attorney in New York, transmitting a supplemental memo regarding the Maxwell investigation and referencing a previous memo and discussions. It indicates ongoing prosecutorial work on the case.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, transmitting a supplemental memo regarding the Maxwell investigation to their team.

events.title: Transmission of Maxwell Investigation Supplemental Memo
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney emails a team, attaching a supplemental memo regarding the Maxwell investigation and referencing previous discussions.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated May 22, 2020, concerning the Maxwell investigation.
An Assistant U.S. Attorney in New York is transmitting a supplemental memo on the case.
The email references a previous memo and subsequent discussions, indicating an ongoing prosecutorial process.
